column17:
Product Description

Helps prevent hair loss.Helps to maintain healthy and thick hair.Stimulates the growth of new hair.Helps Prevent premature graying; stimulates pigmentation.Helps to Protects the scalp and hair from environmental damage Helps to fortify scalp from inside and balances the pH of the scalp and is also beneficial for cleaning of the pores.Gives a soft and healthy shine to the hairs.Prevents itching and scalp infection.DetailsGentle massage or comb your hair before applying Dhathri Hair Care Herbal Oil. Apply 7 to 10ml of Dhathri Hair Care Herbal Oil and leave it for 30 minutes.Use Dheedhi Hair Care Herbal Shampoo or Dhathri Chemparathi Thaali to wash off the extra oil if required. Each bottle of Dhathri Hair Care Herbal Oil can be used for a period of 10 to 15 days for first three months after three months use one bottle for a period of 30 days for permanent use

Product Description

Helps to prevent premature graying. Helps to prevent hairfall and promote hair growth. Works from within the root of the hair and gives natural black colour to the hair. Prepared using Indian indigo a plant rich in indigo which is a colouring agent and 21 other rare ayurvedic ingredients.
